original_text: While they were listening to this, he went on to tell them a parable, because he was near Jerusalem and the people thought that the kingdom of God was going to appear at once.
korean_text: 그들이 이 말씀을 듣고 있을 때에 비유를 더하여 말씀하시니 이는 자기가 예루살렘에 가까이 오셨고 그들은 하나님의 나라가 당장에 나타날 줄로 생각함이더라

sentences.original_text: While they were listening to this
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 이 말을 듣고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: he went on to tell them a parable
kingdom of God was going to appear at once
